item.anchor: const-string/jumbo (.*), "notification_sound"\s+move-object/from16 v0, p0\s+move-object/from16 v1, (.*)\s+move-object/from16 v2, (.*)\s+move-wide/from16 v3, (.*)\s+invoke-direct {v0, v1, v2, v3, (.*)}, Landroid/media/MediaScanner\$MyMediaScannerClient;->setSettingIfNotSet\(Ljava/lang/String;Landroid/net/Uri;J\)V\s+

merge.item:
const-string/jumbo %s, "pre_set_notification_sound"
move-object/from16 v0, p0
move-object/from16 v1, %s
move-object/from16 v2, %s
move-wide/from16 v3, %s
invoke-direct {v0, v1, v2, v3, %s}, Landroid/media/MediaScanner$MyMediaScannerClient;->setSettingIfNotSet(Ljava/lang/String;Landroid/net/Uri;J)V
